data.Name: Lucy Bayard
data.staff_bio:
Lucy Bayard is a training specialist with the National Service Inclusion
Project.  Lucy worked as a special education teacher and as a program
coordinator in the public and not-for-profit sectors developing curricula,
promoting inclusion in schools as well as working with teachers and youth to
create inclusive learning environments throughout the community. She
received an undergraduate degree in service-learning at the University of
Massachusetts at Amherst and her Master's degree in Special Education from
Lesley University.
data.staff_ed:
BA, Service-Learning, University of Massachusetts Amherst
MEd, Special Education, Lesley University
